title: Yeti 160E eMTB, the first EWS race-ready e-bike!
content:
Without trying to hurry the process too much, Yeti quietly has been developing an all-new suspension design for the 160E to be the first e-bike really built specifically to race the e-EWS. Five years in development, the new 160E e-bikeâ€™s Sixfinity suspension platform gives Yeti engineers more control to dial-in race-ready performance within the unique

The post Yeti 160E eMTB, the first EWS race-ready e-bike! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
